plans.name: parent's coverage
plans.description: client < 26 years old, can waive insurance and stay on parent's coverage

plans.name: health maintenance organization
plans.description: restricts insurance coverage to in-network providers only, with few exceptions

plans.name: exclusive provider organization
plans.description: restricts insurance coverage to in-network providers only, but saves on some costs compared to a ppo

plans.name: preferred provider organization
plans.description: emphasizes the ability to go to any doctor/specialist without referral, but is generally costly

plans.name: high deductible health plan
plans.description: emphasizes lower premiums and higher deductibles
